Text: I've been away from the Hulk. Is this the one where he went underground to get away from Banner and rest of the world. Like like Planet Hulk except under earth?
Yeah that's the one...I really don't like Hulk,not even the slightest,but thought to give this new series a chance...I'm going to stick 'till issue 8,but already I'm not interested in this one...
any chance of Hulk 49? i noticed you posted 48.
